synopsis.text: Boy genius Kanipan, now in his teenage years, continues his inventive exploits in the sequel to Hatsumei Boy Kanipan. One day, a mysterious spaceship crash lands on the beach, carrying a female humanoid with no recollection of her past. Kanipan takes on the challenge of restoring her memory, only to stumble upon a shocking revelation: his beloved planet is in imminent peril. As he navigates this newfound crisis, Kanipan's journey promises to be a thrilling blend of adventure, discovery, and the power of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
